body:
In the walls map - Knights Tower , Find the OP fishing Pole called the Avicus and take a screen shot of you Killing someone with it! (don't Anvil a fishing pole, find the one in the map )

Take a screen shot of the OP fishing pole also to prove its the real one.

Will you take the Challenge?
Who will be first?

Good Luck!

title: Contest - Avicus Fishing Pole Kill

replies.body: Then it shouldn't be hard to kill with...
